channel.title: Pages on Magali's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Magali's Blog

item.title: whoami
item.description:
你好！

The exercise of writing this ‘about’ page and thinking about who I am took quite some time. I guess I could start off by saying my name is Magali, and I’m a Computer Science student. I like learning about {natural, programming} languages. I’m also interested in operating systems and open source technologies – on that note, check some of my contributions to the Linux kernel.

As for other things I do in my free time, I really enjoy watching Korean and Chinese dramas, listening to pop music, hanging out when it’s super sunny, and, last but definitely not least, keeping my Duolingo streak intact.
